StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetGEOCi.es]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@StateCode varchar(2), @CountyCode varchar(3) = NULL AS
SELECT CITY_CODE, --- IF THE CITY_TEXT IS NULL (e.g., Washington, DC), THEN --- RETURN THE COUNTY_TEXT. IF COUNTY_TEXT IS ALSO NULL --- (THIS SHOULD NEVER HAPPEN), RETURN AN EMPTY STRING CASE --- WHEN @CountyCode IS NULL THEN COALESCE(CITY_TEXT, 'NULL') + ' (' + COALESCE(COUNTY_TEXT, 'NULL') + ')' WHEN @CountyCode IS NULL THEN CITY_TEXT + ' (' + COUNTY_TEXT + ' COUNTY)' ELSE COALESCE(CITY_TEXT, COUNTY_TEXT, SPACE(0)) END AS CITY_TEXT FROM GEO_LOCATION WHERE STATE_CODE = @StateCode AND --- IF @CountyCode IS NULL, RETRIEVE ALL CITIES FOR THE STATE --- IF @CountyCode IS NOT NULL, RETRIEVE ONLY CITIES THAT BELONG TO THE COUNTY COUNTY_CODE = COALESCE(@CountyCode, COUNTY_CODE) AND CITY_TEXT IS NOT NULL ORDER BY CITY_TEXT
